metadata.title: CVE-2020-24916 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
CGI implementation in Yaws web server versions 1.81 to 2.0.7 is vulnerableto OS command injection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24916` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

erlang-yapp - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
erlang-yaws - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
yaws - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
yaws-chat - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
yaws-mail - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
yaws-wiki - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
yaws-yapp - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yaws package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.8+dfsg-1').
